shortDescription.text: Out of bounds memory access in github.com/open-policy-agent/opa

fullDescription.text: An issue in the component ast/parser.go of Open Policy Agent v0.39.0 causes the application to incorrectly interpret every expression, causing a Denial of Service (DoS) via triggering out-of-range memory access.

help.text:
Vulnerability CVE-2022-28946
Severity: HIGH
Package: github.com/open-policy-agent/opa
Fixed Version: 0.40.0
Link: [CVE-2022-28946](https://avd.aquasec.com/nvd/cve-2022-28946)
An issue in the component ast/parser.go of Open Policy Agent v0.39.0 causes the application to incorrectly interpret every expression, causing a Denial of Service (DoS) via triggering out-of-range memory access.

An issue in the component ast/parser.go of Open Policy Agent v0.39.0 causes the application to incorrectly interpret every expression, causing a Denial of Service (DoS) via triggering out-of-range memory access.

fullDescription.text: An issue in the AST parser (ast/compile.go) of Open Policy Agent v0.10.2 allows attackers to cause a Denial of Service (DoS) via a crafted input.

help.text:

Package: github.com/open-policy-agent/opa
Fixed Version: 0.42.0
Link: [CVE-2022-33082](https://avd.aquasec.com/nvd/cve-2022-33082)
An issue in the AST parser (ast/compile.go) of Open Policy Agent v0.10.2 allows attackers to cause a Denial of Service (DoS) via a crafted input.

fullDescription.text: The x/crypto/ssh package before 0.0.0-20211202192323-5770296d904e of golang.org/x/crypto allows an attacker to panic an SSH server.

fullDescription.text: The golang.org/x/crypto/ssh package before 0.0.0-20220314234659-1baeb1ce4c0b for Go allows an attacker to crash a server in certain circumstances involving AddHostKey.

fullDescription.text: Go before 1.17.10 and 1.18.x before 1.18.2 has Incorrect Privilege Assignment. When called with a non-zero flags parameter, the Faccessat function could incorrectly report that a file is accessible.

help.text:
Vulnerability CVE-2022-29526
Severity: MEDIUM
Package: golang.org/x/sys
Fixed Version: 0.0.0-20220412211240-33da011f77ad
Link: [CVE-2022-29526](https://avd.aquasec.com/nvd/cve-2022-29526)
Go before 1.17.10 and 1.18.x before 1.18.2 has Incorrect Privilege Assignment. When called with a non-zero flags parameter, the Faccessat function could incorrectly report that a file is accessible.

shortDescription.text: crash when attempting to deserialize invalid input

fullDescription.text: An issue in the Unmarshal function in Go-Yaml v3 causes the program to crash when attempting to deserialize invalid input.

help.text:
Vulnerability CVE-2022-28948
Severity: HIGH
Package: gopkg.in/yaml.v3
Fixed Version: 3.0.0-20220521103104-8f96da9f5d5e
Link: [CVE-2022-28948](https://avd.aquasec.com/nvd/cve-2022-28948)
An issue in the Unmarshal function in Go-Yaml v3 causes the program to crash when attempting to deserialize invalid input.
